Class EmailModel

java.lang.Object
metroMalaga.Model.EmailModel
public class EmailModel extends Object
Model class representing an email message.

    • EmailModel

      public EmailModel(int messageNumber, String sender, String subject, String content)
      Constructor for EmailModel.
      Parameters:
      messageNumber - The sequence number of the message.
      sender - The sender's email address.
      subject - The subject of the email.
      content - The content/body of the email.
